verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Afterwards <S%G2517><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> <S%G1353><s%> Journeyed Through <S%G2596><s%> City By City <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Village By Village, <S%G2968><s%> Preaching <S%G2784><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings, <S%G2097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve Were <S%G1427><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Who <S%G2258><s%> Had Been Cured <S%G2323><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Infirmities, <S%G769><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Called <S%G2564><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Had Gone Out; <S%G1831><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Joanna <S%G2489><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> Of Chuza <S%G5529><s%> A Steward <S%G2012><s%> Of Herod; <S%G2264><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Susanna, <S%G4677><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G2087><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Were Ministering <S%G1247><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5224><s%> Their Property. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4896><s%> And Assembling <S%G1161><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Those Who <S%G2596><s%> From Each City <S%G4172><s%> Were Coming <S%G1975><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> He Spoke <S%G2036><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> A Parable. <S%G3850><s%>

Went Out <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sower <S%G4687><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Sow <S%G4687><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4703><s%> His Seed; <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As Sowed <S%G4687><s%> <S%G846><s%> He <S%G3739><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way, <S%G3598><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Trampled Upon, <S%G2662><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G4071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Devoured <S%G2719><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rock, <S%G4073><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sprung Up <S%G5453><s%> It Withered, <S%G3583><s%> Because <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> It <S%G3361><s%> Had Not <S%G2192><s%> Moisture; <S%G2429><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns, <S%G173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sprung Up Together <S%G4855><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns <S%G173><s%> <S%G638><s%> It; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sprung Up <S%G5453><s%> Produced <S%G4160><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> A Hundredfold. <S%G1542><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%>, He Cried, <S%G5455><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> That Has <S%G2192><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> Let Him Hear. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G1905><s%> And Asked <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> May Be <S%G1498><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3850><s%> This Parable? <S%G3778><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> It Has Been Given <S%G1325><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mysteries <S%G3466><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But To The <S%G1161><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables, <S%G3850><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Seeing <S%G991><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> They May See, <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G191><s%> Hearing <S%G3361><s%> They May Not Understand. <S%G4920><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And Those <S%G1161><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Hear; <S%G191><s%> Then <S%G1534><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Takes Away <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> <S%G846><s%> Their Heart, <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> Having Believed <S%G4100><s%> They Should Be Saved. <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And Those <S%G1161><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rock, <S%G4073><s%> Those Who <S%G3739><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> They Hear, <S%G191><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Receive <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> A Root <S%G4491><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Not, <S%G2192><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> A Time <S%G2540><s%> Believe, <S%G4100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Of Trial <S%G3986><s%> Fall Away. <S%G868><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And That Which <S%G1161><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns <S%G173><s%> Fell, <S%G4098><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Having Heard, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Cares <S%G3308><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Riches <S%G4149><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pleasures <S%G2237><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life <S%G979><s%> Moving Along <S%G4198><s%> Are Choked, <S%G4846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Do Bring To Perfection. <S%G5052><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And That <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Ground, <S%G1093><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3748><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Heart <S%G2588><s%> Right <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Keep It, <S%G2722><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bring Forth Fruit <S%G2592><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Endurance. <S%G5281><s%>

<S%G3762><s%> And No One <S%G1161><s%> A Lamp <S%G3088><s%> Having Lighted <S%G681><s%> Covers <S%G2572><s%> It <S%G846><s%> With A Vessel, <S%G4632><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Under <S%G5270><s%> A Couch <S%G2825><s%> Puts It, <S%G5087><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> A Lampstand <S%G3087><s%>, Puts It, <S%G2007><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Enter In <S%G1531><s%> May See <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light. <S%G5457><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not Anything <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Hidden <S%G2927><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Manifest <S%G5318><s%> Shall Become; <S%G1096><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Secret <S%G614><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%>, Shall Not Be Known <S%G1097><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Light <S%G5318><s%> Come. <S%G2064><s%>

Take Heed <S%G991><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Ye Hear; <S%G191><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Have, <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> Whoever <S%G3361><s%> May Not Have, <S%G2192><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Seems <S%G1380><s%> To Have <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Taken <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3854><s%> And Came <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mother <S%G3384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Were Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Get <S%G4940><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd. <S%G3793><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Told <S%G518><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> Thy Mother <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brethren <S%G4675><s%> Are Standing <S%G2476><s%> Without, <S%G1854><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Wishing. <S%G2309><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3384><s%> My Mother <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren <S%G3450><s%> Those <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Are Hearing <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Doing <S%G4160><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Of The <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Entered <S%G1684><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Ship, <S%G4143><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Let Us Pass Over <S%G1330><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side <S%G4008><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lake; <S%G3041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Put Off. <S%G321><s%>

<S%G4126><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And As They Sailed <S%G846><s%> He Fell Asleep; <S%G879><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came Down <S%G2597><s%> A Storm <S%G2978><s%> Of Wind <S%G417><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lake, <S%G3041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Were Being Filled, <S%G4845><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were In Danger. <S%G2793><s%>

<S%G4334><s%> And Having Come To Him <S%G1161><s%> They Aroused <S%G1326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> We Are Perishing. <S%G622><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Having Arisen <S%G1453><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wind <S%G417><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Raging <S%G2830><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Water; <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Ceased, <S%G3973><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> A Calm. <S%G1055><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Your Faith? <S%G5216><s%> <S%G5399><s%> And Being Afraid <S%G1161><s%> They Wondered, <S%G2296><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G687><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Winds <S%G417><s%> He Commands <S%G2004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water, <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Obey <S%G5219><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Sailed Down <S%G2668><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Country <S%G5561><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%>, Gadarenes, <S%G1046><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Over Against <S%G495><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

<S%G1831><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And On His Having Gone Forth <S%G846><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Met <S%G5221><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City, <S%G4172><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> For <S%G1537><s%> <S%G5550><s%> A Long Time, <S%G2425><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Garment <S%G2440><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%>, Was Wearing, <S%G1737><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A House <S%G3614><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Abide, <S%G3306><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tombs. <S%G3418><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Cried Out <S%G349><s%> He Fell Down Before <S%G4363><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> To Me <S%G1698><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most High? <S%G5310><s%> I Beseech <S%G1189><s%> Of Thee <S%G4675><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Thou Mayest Torment. <S%G928><s%>

<S%G3853><s%> For He Was Charging <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> To Come Out <S%G1831><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man. <S%G444><s%> <S%G4183><s%> For Many <S%G1063><s%> Times <S%G5550><s%> It Had Seized <S%G4884><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Bound, <S%G1196><s%> With Chains <S%G254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fetters <S%G3976><s%> Being Kept, <S%G5442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Breaking <S%G1284><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bonds <S%G1199><s%> He Was Driven <S%G1643><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demon <S%G1142><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deserts. <S%G2048><s%>

<S%G1905><s%> And Asked <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Thy <S%G4671><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Name? <S%G3686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Legion, <S%G3003><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Had Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> He Would Command <S%G2004><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss <S%G12><s%> To Go Away. <S%G565><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> Now There Was <S%G1161><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> A Herd <S%G34><s%> Of Swine <S%G5519><s%> Many <S%G2425><s%> Feeding <S%G1006><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain, <S%G3735><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Besought <S%G3870><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Would Allow <S%G2010><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> To Enter; <S%G1525><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Allowed <S%G2010><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>
